title: Combined indicators for regions and cities
description: Indicatores that describes each 19 regions in Republic of Kazakhstan

sources.title: The Bureau of National Statistics of Kazakhstan

fields.name: Region
fields.description: Region and major cities name

fields.name: air_pollution_index
fields.description: A metric indicating the level of air pollution

fields.name: avg_salary
fields.description: Average salary of the residents in the region

fields.name: Total_city_population
fields.description: Total population of the region

fields.name: clearance_rate
fields.description: Rate at which crimes are solved divided by the number of crimes

fields.name: crime_amount
fields.description: Total number of crimes

fields.name: gdp_per_capita_tenge
fields.description: Gross Domestic Product (GDP) per capita in Tenge

fields.name: Postgraduate_Education
fields.description: Proportion of the population with postgraduate education

fields.name: Higher_Education
fields.description: Proportion of the population with higher education

fields.name: household_spending_per_month
fields.description: Average household spending per month

fields.name: life_expectancy
fields.description: Average life expectancy of the residents

fields.name: med_institutions_amount
fields.description: Number of medical institutions per 10,000 inhabitants

fields.name: number_of_cars
fields.description: Number of cars per 1,000 inhabitants

fields.name: number_of_schools
fields.description: Number of schools per 10,000 inhabitants in the region

fields.name: public_transport_quantity
fields.description: Quantity of public transportation per 10,000 inhabitants

fields.name: unemployment_rate
fields.description: Unemployment rate in the city.

fields.name: number of entertainment places
fields.description: Number of entertainment venues per 10,000 inhabitants

resources.name: final-rating
resources.title: Final gained score for each region and city

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique identifier

fields.description: Region and major cities name
